[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(0,0,0,0) 92%|#ffffff 92%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”92%” background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_end_position=”8%” background_image=”https://www.intheknow.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/LGBTQI-landing.jpg” background_position=”top_center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_color_gradient_stops_tablet=”rgba(0,0,0,0) 95%|#ffffff 95%” background_color_gradient_stops_phone=”rgba(0,0,0,0) 87%|#ffffff 87%” background_color_gradient_start_position_tablet=”95%” background_color_gradient_start_position_phone=”87%” background_color_gradient_end_position_tablet=”5%” background_color_gradient_end_position_phone=”13%” custom_css_main_element=” background-position: 50% 30% !important; ” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” height=”55vh” height_tablet=”45vh” height_phone=”25vh” height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex !important;||align-items: flex-end;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”f0b17bce-2959-4c3c-90b7-8c28a8aac175″ text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#0a0909″ text_font_size=”62px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|0px||0px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”60px” text_font_size_phone=”34px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”font-family: ‘Impact Label’;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

LGBTQI+ Services

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#414143″ text_font_size=”38px” text_line_height=”1em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||-2px||false|false” custom_padding=”33px|38px||38px|false|true” text_text_color_last_edited=”off|desktop” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”28px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”font-family: %22trashhand%22;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Hey there…

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”44a5c643-4e1c-4478-b397-266b3936250c” text_font_size=”19px” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”23px|70px||35px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”|0px|||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”18px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Misunderstanding and prejudice can mean getting the info and support you need around sex and porn can be tricky for some people, this can be true for our LGBTQI+ communities.  We have teamed up with some amazing services who work with queer, gender diverse, takatāpui & intersex youth, their friends, whānau and wider communities, who can support you, talk confidently with you and understand your experience. It’s important to not to do this alone – check them out here:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”tab four row” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#ffffff” background_image=”https://www.intheknow.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/relationships.jpg” parallax=”on” parallax_method=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”7e82feb3-12e0-4a65-ab4f-8686eecc6966″ global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”103%|103%” border_width_all__hover=”3px”]

OUTLINE NZ

Confidential LGBTIQA+/Rainbow phone peer support and counselling by specialists in sexuality and gender issues. Face to face counselling is available in Auckland or via Skype in other regions.

Confidential Freephone:  
0800 688 5463 6pm-9pm
outline.org.nz

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”7e82feb3-12e0-4a65-ab4f-8686eecc6966″ hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”103%|103%” border_width_all__hover=”3px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Be There

Be There is a website and awareness campaign that aims to support the parents and whānau of trans, non-binary, takatāpui, queer, intersex, and rainbow young people to be more inclusive, affirming and safe. Connect with community, and find support for yourself or your rainbow loved one.

be-there.nz

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”7e82feb3-12e0-4a65-ab4f-8686eecc6966″ global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”103%|103%” border_width_all__hover=”3px”]

Health Navigator

Check out the health navigator gender diversity page which has heaps of other resources on support and help for gender diverse young people and their family/whānau.

healthnavigator.org.nz

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”7e82feb3-12e0-4a65-ab4f-8686eecc6966″ hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”103%|103%” border_width_all__hover=”3px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

I’m Local

The I’m Local Project aims to help queer & gender diverse youth all over Aotearoa to feel valued, recognised and supported in their local communities.

imlocal.co.nz

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”7e82feb3-12e0-4a65-ab4f-8686eecc6966″ global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”103%|103%” border_width_all__hover=”3px”]

Rainbow Youth

Support, information and advocacy for young queer, gender diverse and intersex young people. They have drop-in centres, counselling services and an anonymous online chat service 2-4pm weekdays. 

ry.org.nz

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
